sap.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: the watery substance that carries food through a plant
sap.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a stupid person who is easy to deceive or treat badly
sap.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to make something weaker or destroy it, especially someone’s strength or their determination to do something
sap.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: Her long illness was gradually sapping Charlotte’s strength.
